headline: AIG Closes Sale of its Global Personal Travel Insurance and Assistance Business including Travel Guard® to Zurich
summary: NEW YORK, December 03, 2024--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced that it successfully closed the previously announced sale of its global individual personal travel insurance and assistance business, including Travel Guard, to Zurich Insurance Group on December 2, 2024.
